anomaly_observations.cpu_usage: Frequent spikes reaching 99%, indicating potential CPU bottlenecks
anomaly_observations.memory_usage: Consistently high usage nearing 92%, raising concerns for memory leaks or suboptimal configurations
anomaly_observations.latency: Elevated latency values frequent, suggesting potential service delays possibly due to high load or resource starvation
anomaly_observations.disk_usage: Peaked at 97%, potentially leading to I/O constraints
anomaly_observations.temperature: Noticeable spikes in temperature, suggesting possible cooling issues
anomaly_observations.service_degradation: Multiple instances of service degradation noted, particularly with 'API Gateway' and 'Cache'

recommendations.details: Distribute incoming traffic more evenly across servers to reduce CPU and memory strains.
Upgrade or scale out the current server configurations to support higher CPU demands, or optimize resource utilization with performance profiling tools.
Investigate potential memory leaks in applications; optimize memory allocations and garbage collection processes.
Increase disk capacity or clean up unnecessary files to prevent storage bottlenecks. Implement data archival and compression strategies.
Enhance cooling mechanisms in the data center and ensure adequate airflow to manage device temperatures effectively.
Investigate and resolve root causes of repeated service degradation, possibly by scaling services or optimizing configurations.
Implement or improve existing monitoring systems to promptly detect and respond to anomalies and threshold breaches.
